text: Appland is a cloud computing company headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden, that develops white label app store solutions for mobile operators, mobile devices, online communities, smart TVs, connected vehicles and internet of things. In 2015 the company won "2015 Red Herring Top Europe Award"Red Herring Award and a spot in "33-listan", an annual list of the 33 most promising Swedish startups awarded by Ny Teknik and Affärsvärlden. == References == == External links == * Category:Software companies of Sweden
title: Appland
